0xA691C10054275290.name: _SET_PLAYER_DISMOUNT_TIMESTAMP_FOR_HORSE
0xA691C10054275290.comment: dismountTimer gets called with the data from `_GET_PLAYER_DISMOUNT_TIMESTAMP`

examples.code:
local size = 15
local struct = DataView.ArrayBuffer(size * 8)
struct:SetInt32(0, size)
local numLoot = Citizen.InvokeNative(0xB29C553BA582D09E, struct:Buffer(), `a_c_cow`, 0, 2, Citizen.ResultAsInteger())
if (numLoot > 0) then
for i = 1, numLoot do
local hash = struct:GetInt32(i * 8)
print(("i: %d: loot: %d"):format(i, hash))
end
end
